All extention filled with this plugin will display file properties only.

Created by Corey.
This plugin simply copy the file to temp folder with a new extension(user-defined) which Seer supported internally.

For example:
Seer has a build-in extension TS which is a media type. And TS is also a extension for TypeScript, a plaintext type.
In this situation, plugin can copy TS file to temp folder with a TXT extension, then Seer can treat the file as a TXT file. Furthermore, you can replace TXT with JS, so that Seer can read file with a JS code highlight.
